acts.act: Protection of children from sexual offence act 2012

business_details.Business: Accused person Sri Kamal Paul is produced from the jail hazot and he is again remanded till next dare. Seen the bail petition dated 31.07.2019 filed by one Sri Sushil Das praying for allowing the accused to go on bail on the ground stated in the petition supported by an affidavit. Heard learned lawyers of the both side. Perused the case record. Also perused the statement of the victim girl recorded under section 164 of the CrPC. It is found that within mandatory detention period charge sheet was submitted under sections 363/328 of the IPC R/W section 4 of the POCSO Act. It has been submitted by the learned lawyer appearing on behalf of the accused person that the matter of hampering and tempering of the investigation is over and that for fair trial his release on bail is necessary. Taking all aspects into consideration the prayer is allowed. Accordingly the accused person Sri Kamal Paul is allowed to go on bail of Rs. 40,000/- with a local surety of like amount.          No PW is present. Issue fresh summons to PWs.          Fixing 16.08.2019 for evidence.
Accused Kamal Paul is produced from jail hazat and further remanded till next date        PWs absent. Summons not returned. Issue fresh summons to them.

Accused Kamal Paul is present.       PWs Uttam Mazumdar, Smt. Namita Mazumdar and Sanjit Das are present. They are examined, cross-examined and discharged. Issue summons to rest PWs.          Fixing 30/10/19 for F/Evidence.
accused present.PWs absent.Summon not returned.  issue fresh
Court work is disrupted due to agitation.accused absent with step.PWs absent. summon not served properly. Issue fresh

case record received on transfer from the Hon&#039ble District and sessions judge for Disposal.Accused Kamal Paul is present.One PW was present who was examined , cross examined and discharged.Issue summon to the victim.
